page.title: 02LANDSCAPE. PAGE 1.
page.content: The reference number of our second block is 05080375 and our area covers Newball and Bullington. The area is very low lying and has only recently been extensively drained.Five or six years ago Barlings river was dredged and deepened.The farmers have been able to improve the drainage of their land.The group of children surveying the area noticed that ditches had been deepened and new land drains made. Some old pasture has been ploughed and consequently,when we looked around most of the fields seemed to be taken over by winter wheat and sugar-beet. When we looked around we could see that the woodlands seemed to be on higher land.We also noticed that the few farms and houses were built on gravel "islands".
